solution_line_template: Daniel buys both magazine and pencil for ${magazine_cost} + ${pencil_cost} = $<<{magazine_cost}+{pencil_cost}={total_initial_cost}>>{total_initial_cost}.
The coupon gives him a total cost of ${total_initial_cost} - ${coupon_discount} = $<<{total_initial_cost}-{coupon_discount}={final_cost}>>{final_cost}.
